fields.text: Calls forth a meteor shower that burns and damages all impacted enemies
Call down the fury of the mountains to deal cold damage to enemies in your path
+1 Cold Trail for every +1 Spell Power (Max 3)
Shapeshift into an apex pack leader, gaining massive speed and fire damage
The winds are yours to control, granting you movement speed and defensive prowess
Fire, Cold and Lightning Resists increased by 10%
Summons a commander of the wolf pack to fight by your side
+1 Fenris for every 30 character levels and +1 Fenris for every +7 Summoning Power
Take a bite out of your enemies, dealing damage and lowering their fire resistance
Attack multiple nearby targets in rapid succession with a damaging fire ring
Engulf your claws in hellfire to deal massive damage to a single enemy while stealing mana
Physical Damage increased by 25% and Fire Damage increased by 150%
Open volcanic vents below your enemies which deal immense damage
Shapeshift into an arctic beast, increasing your damage and piercing enemy cold resistances
Send forth a wave of condensed frozen spheres, slowing and damaging all impacted enemies
Summon a ferocious Grizzly Bear to fight by your side
+1 Grizzly for every 30 character levels and +1 Grizzly for every +7 Summoning Power
Send enemies scrambling away in fear
Creates a polar vortex around you, dealing continuous damage to all within
Debuff all enemies in a large area by lowering their damage and physical resistance
Reduces Enemy Attack and Cast Rate by 20%
Sacrifice movement speed to heal allies and improve their hit recovery rate
Send forth waves of rock to crush your enemies beneath the weight
An attack that increases your damage and attack rating while lowering enemy cold immunity
Chance of Open Wounds increased by 25%
Summon a murder of ravens to peck out the eyes of your foes
Number of attacks before despawn doubled
+1 Raven for every 19 character levels and +1 Raven for every +2 Summoning Power
Summon a vine that consumes enemy corpses, converting them into your own life and mana
Summon a vine that deals poison damage by ambushing enemies from below
Max Creepers increased by 1 and Poison damage increased by 20%
Creates a spiraling ring of flame that deals fire damage to unlucky enemies
Unleash a primal call that lowers nearby enemies' speed and defense
Send roots underground that damage and stun your enemies
Summon an ancient poison-spewing plant to fight by your side
Wind energy grants you strength and speed to obliterate your foes
Conjure a lethal mist from the Swamps of Scosglen to damage your enemies
Strike enemies automatically and repeatedly with deadly bolts of lightning
Thunderbolt frequency benefits from Cooldown Reduction and Celestial Aid
Summon a volcano that spits fire bombs randomly, dealing both physical and fire damage
